Package frc.robot.helpers

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • frc.robot.helpers.Helper
  • public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
    The helper class. Defines various functions used throughout the codebase. These usually tend to be trivial math functions that we don't want to copy into each subsystem.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Helper()

    • Method Detail

      • boundValue

        public static double boundValue​(double value,
                                double min,
                                double max)
        Given a value, checks to makes sure it is between min and max. If not replace with the value of min or max. If so return value
        Parameters:
        value - The value to check
        min - The minimum acceptable value
        max - The maximum acceptable value
        Returns:
        The sanity value after check

      • analogToDigital

        public static double analogToDigital​(double value,
                                     double deadzone,
                                     double output)
        Makes a stick act as a button.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the stick
        deadzone - the deadzone
        output - the default output value

      • boundValue

        public static double boundValue​(double value)
        Given a value, checks to makes sure it is between -1.0 and 1.0. If not replace with the value with -1.0 or 1.0. If so return value
        Parameters:
        value - The value to check
        Returns:
        The sanity value after check

      • deadzone

        public static double deadzone​(double value,
                              double size)
        Creates a virtual deadzone. If a value is between the lower max and upper min, it will output zero. If a value is outside this range, the original value will be outputted.
        Parameters:
        value - value to deadzone
        size - the size of the deadzone
        Returns:
        the "deadzoned" version of the input value

      • deadzone

        public static double deadzone​(double value,
                              ControllerWrapper controller)
        Creates a virtual deadzone on a specific controller.
        Parameters:
        value - value to deadzone
        controller - the controller to set the deadzone on
        Returns:
        the "deadzoned" version of the input value

      • desensitize

        public static double desensitize​(double value)
        Takes the value and returns the value to the third power
        Parameters:
        value - value to be cubed
        Returns:
        the third power of value

      • tolerance

        public static boolean tolerance​(double value,
                                double target,
                                double tolerance)
        Checks whether given value is within the given tolerance percentage range of the target.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check (usually RPM, position, or other measurements)
        target - the target value for the output
        tolerance - percentage range of tolerance as a decimal (0 to 1)
        Returns:
        whether value is within tolerance
